name: File Naming Conventions
description: Enforces consistent file naming across different languages. Based on language-standards.md
author: Promptcraft

rules.message: TypeScript/JavaScript files must use kebab-case (e.g., user-profile.tsx, api-client.ts)
Python files must use snake_case (e.g., user_profile.py, api_client.py)
Bash scripts should use snake_case with descriptive names (e.g., backup_files.sh, log_rotation.sh)
Go files should use lowercase with no separators (e.g., userprofile.go, apiclient.go)
